warn.songLimit: This shanty lasts too long! %%MAX%% seconds be th' max!
warn.confirmSkip: This will skip th' DJ, jab th' mouse again t' confirm.
warn.confirmEject: This will scuttle th' DJ from th' wait-list, jab th' mouse again t' confirm.
warn.isTrusted: Ne'er execute code from someone ye don't fully trust! Click here t' confirm 'n execute code.
warn.djInHistory:
%%DJ%% be playin' a shanty in history 
Author : %%AUTHOR%% 
Title : %%TITLE%%
Played by :%%HISTORYDJ%% %%TURNS%% song(s) ago. %%SKIP%%
warn.fastBan: This will perma-ban th' user, jab th' mouse once t' validate.
warn.leaving: [Plug-It] Navigation warn: Are ye sure ye wants t' leave?
warn.boothAlert: Crow's nest alert : Ye will be playin' in %%POS%% turn make sure t' pick a shanty!
warn.nextMediaInHistory: Your next shanty is in th' cabin history!
warn.possibleDuplicate:
This could be a duplicate (based on author/name):
%%AUTHOR%% - %%TITLE%%
%%NAME1%% - %%NAME2%%
warn.unlistedCommand:
This command ain't listed 'cause it can break yer playlists!
Please, backup all o' them afore attemptin' t' do this command again.
This can 'n will prolly spam yer chat!
Type th' command again or jab the mouse on this message t' confirm.

error.autoJoin3: Singer list be filled t' th' brim
error.noUserByName: They is no pirate by this name
error.noLastMention: Could nah find yer last mention.
error.noSufficentPermissions: Ye not worthy enough for that command.
error.staffKick: Ye can nah kick user wit' greater or equal rank than ye.
error.staffBan: Ye can nah ban user wit' greater or equal rank than ye.
error.cannotSkipFinished: Th' shanty ye wants t' skip has finished playin'!
error.cannotGrab: Cannot grab in current playlist, be it full?
error.cannotGetMediaID: Could nah get media ID, check console fer more details.
error.APIFloodDetected: API flood detected! Deactivated th' API 'n internal calls t' it fer 10s.
error.APIFLoodInEffect: This action be unavailable due t' an API flood.

success.notGrabed: Ye can grab this shanty 'cause ye don't 'ave it yet!
success.noDuplicates: Duplicate check finished: no results. Congrats!
success.noRenaming: No shanties t' rename, yer playlists are clean!
success.noUnavailable: Unavailable shanty search finished! No broken shanties found!

userchat.inputDisabled: Turn off Away From Ship responder t' chat!
